commands.name: update-dt
commands.description: Goes to gitlab and updates the local dt, note that you'll need an environment variable for this (the script tells you which)

commands.name: git-configure
commands.description: Updates a local repo with a local git configuration. Allows you to easily work on multiple accounts without having to re-configure when switching work.

commands.name: airmon-start-monitor-mode
commands.description: Put a wifi device into monitor mode

commands.name: airmon-stop-monitor-mode
commands.description: Put a wifi device into managed mode

commands.name: branches
commands.description: Shows all the local branches of a repo by date

commands.name: check-interface-mode
commands.description: Shows the current mode of wifi devices

commands.name: kismetdb-to-pcap
commands.description: Takes a kismet database and translates it to a pcap file
